Title: X.
Writer: Jonathan E. Steinberg (created by), Robert Levine (created by), Michael S. Chernuchin, Heather Bellson (story editor)
Actors: Toby Stephens, Hannah New, Luke Arnold, Jessica Parker Kennedy
Plot: Flint gives "advice" to Dufresne. John Silver works to become indispensable. Eleanor is called upon to remove Vane from power over the fort. Jack becomes envious of Anne and Max's new relationship.
